ygData.subject: RE: Plane of losses
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, like any good bard, I try to get along with everybody:-).  Caveat: anyone who thinks their bard can play better riffs on their mandolin than Galtin may
ygData.messageBody:
Well, like any good bard, I try to get along with everybody:-). Caveat:
anyone who thinks their bard can play better riffs on their mandolin than
Galtin may force me to open up a can of whoop ass! Eric Clapton comes to me
for lessons:-)

Galtin of E'ci (extremely bored at work and wanting to go home so I can get
my corpse)


> One thing I did find I like about your current post is you mentioned you
> could be off bases kind of nice to not have somebody shove their opinion
> down your throat.
>
> Naeeldar
>
>
